text: <@U78C4L1FZ> So good to have you onboard now
~Gone to pick up Noa from school, bbiab~ nevermind she has a playdate :smile:
Good to have you with us! <@U78C4L1FZ>

Hi guys, ladies, team members, 

My name is Stinie. Some of you have met me in person.  I feel lucky to be welcomed as a new team member here. I like to introduce myself to you. 

So.

Hi. Nice to meet you all.

If you are in a hurry. Read no further. 

Just say hi back if you feel like it 

:wink:


If you love reading and have loads of time and want to read my not so brief introduction then go on reading.

Be my guest.

The long and the short of it.

Brief writing is not my core competence (yet).

I really like to learn this along the way.


Today it's 98 days ago that I 'met' Jan Hein via Twitter.

<https://twitter.com/yeehaa/status/876571506821791744>

Af few days later we met in person at UEB West and I felt good about our 'encounter'.

At the moment I am in a very exploitative phase of my life. 

I am not sure what I am going to contribute to OffCourse. 

At the same time I am convinced that I will contribute. 

Also I have a lot of personal things to sort out as well. 

I like to share photo's on Instagram.

<https://www.instagram.com/stinie_>

In 2001 I started one of the first Instagram communities in the Netherlands and I had a lot of fun meeting nice people and exploring Rotterdam this way and I enjoyed collaborating with organization.

In 2015 I had to stop with being 'the mother' of the InstaWalk010 community and focus solely on myself due to personal reasons.

By the way I was a backend and frontend developer and I left my job in 2010. 

I don't know at the moment if I want to pick up my old profession or if I want to develop a different future or both....

Currently I only know that I want to keep exploring and by exploring my path will unfold itself to me (and others).

The first thing I want to contribute to OffCourse is my photography. 

I like to look at the world through a camera and that's why <@U0ARRNM3R> asked me if I want to document you guys in action.

So prepare yourself and get used to me and my camera visiting the 42Workspace office.

Before we publish any photo's you will be asked first Of(f) Course.

No publishing without permission.

That's about me.

What and how about you.

I am curious.

So if you like to introduce yourself as well.

Go ahead.

If that is not your thing.

Fine as well.

We'll meet via a different path then.

Have a good day,

Stinie 


A little professional history of mine
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/stinie/>

text: <@U0ARRNM3R> can you give me the login details? Maybe I can try some things out :)
Thanks, <@U177W7XH8>! I'll wait for more feedback and make adjustments/a plan :simple_smile:
Maybe we could also make a new page about our mission/values

<@U0ARRNM3R> Content looks great to me! But can we make the font on the side bar (mobile) or navigation bar (desktop) appear bigger? They are really small now. Also the LinkedIn link on the bottom doesn't work.

Hi <!channel>, using <@U6FC3B76V> brilliant nautical input, I changed the content on the website. Could you take a look and see what you think? Mostly: is it clear (enough)? Does it inspire the learner in you? And can we think of a design or images that suits the nautical theme better (<@U78C4L1FZ>, <@U17C0L2VA> )? >> <https://offcourse.io/>

attachments.title: Home
attachments.text: Offcourse is an online, open source and free platform built on the premise anything someone wants to learn, can be found online.

text: I'm gone for the weekend. Have a great weekend folks!
Definitely interested. keep me in the loop.
If you are interested in coming I can poke you when the ticket sales begin.

I don't think I said. We are going to the CCC congress in Leipzig and thinking of renting an apartment in Leipzig for the time of the congress. We'll be more sure about it when we actually have tickets.
See you in a bit. Just got to the office
gone to pick up Noa from school, bbl

attachments.title: serverless-cljs-plugin
attachments.text: A Serverless plugin for deploying Clojurescript functions

text: Wow, holidays must have been really relaxing. You look so good <@U177W7XH8> :wink:
Should this be your profile picture, <@U177W7XH8>? ^^
Have some meetings in between so if we are not there just ask Birgit to open the office
Yes, <@U0ARRNM3R> and I are both there
Hey I just got back. Any ppl at the office today?
really signing off now, before the inmates are running the asylum
Will do! And feel free to open as many new ones that you may need <@U6Y7WRLTT>
Thanks for the heads up <@U0D6EPESC>. Please pull me into any rooms you think are relevant.
<@U6Y7WRLTT> how did it go? Did you see <@U0ARRNM3R> big announcement in the <#C2LN0JUSY|business-development> channel?
<@U6Y7WRLTT> Lets move these to the webdev Channel. Dont think the others are that interested in our nerd talk...  :smirk:
<@U6Y7WRLTT> :wink: just use the threading macros (like in elixir) youll be fine
<@U0D6EPESC> Didn't Jon also share an app that was doing smart flash cards?
<@U6FC3B76V> Missed your Messages earlier, but looks cool! I saw that Duolingo is also doing something with flash cards called Tiny Cards.
Just wanted to share this app based on a great collection of flash cards <https://www.educationalappstore.com/app/memrise-learn-languages-free>

attachments.title: Memrise: learn languages free
attachments.text: Memrise uses what&#39;s called "elaborate encoding" to help you remember different concepts. Instead of having you just read through words and their translations, and trying to me...
attachments.fallback: Educational App Store: Memrise: learn languages free

text: <@U177W7XH8> <@U0ARRNM3R> fixed the sign-in  / sign-up bug. Got in yesterday during some maintenance on the back end.

Well done <@U0D6EPESC> ! My feedback:
- Youtube embedding doesn’t always work
- Formatting of output is sometimes weird, e.g. <https://demo.offcourse.io/users/offcourse/courses/use-the-command-line/checkpoints/have-fun-with-cows>
- Sign up/in doesn’t work. I get the pop up but i don’t actually get signed in.
- I guess the font of the platform is designed for Chrome, because in Firefox and Safari the font is bold everywhere.
- I'm getting a lot of 404 errors.
- Sometimes I'm not getting anything; no text or 404 error, just a blank page with a title. For example: <https://demo.offcourse.io/users/offcourse/courses/master-the-basics-of-html/checkpoints/keep-it-semantic>

<@U0ARRNM3R> Thanks! Quick responses:
- Yeah, that's a flow, that is not quite there yet. You have to press tab (lose focus first). Let's look at it, okay?
- test is the name of the user that you are logged in as (test user). I'll think of something else. Or better yet, that's content isn't it :wink:
P.S. I've got some interface writing to do...
I'm definitely confident to share this. Exciting!! :champagne:
Also love the fact that we can now get the url :smile: :thumbsup: <@U177W7XH8>
